00001 ######################################################################
00002 # Name:    themes.tcl
00003 # Author:  Trevor Williams  (phase1geo@gmail.com)
00004 # Date:    07/09/2014
00005 # Brief:   Creates and sets the main UI theme to the given value.
00006 ######################################################################
00007 
00008 namespace eval themes {
00009   
00010   array set themes {
00011     dark {"#303030" "#b0b0b0"}
00012   }
00013   
00014   ######################################################################
00015   # Initializes the themes list.
00016   proc initialize {} {
00017     
00018     variable themes
00019     
00020     # Add a few styles to the default (light) theme
00021     ttk::style theme settings clam {
00022       
00023       # BButton
00024       ttk::style configure BButton [ttk::style configure TButton]
00025       ttk::style configure BButton -anchor center -padding 2 -relief flat
00026       ttk::style map       BButton [ttk::style map TButton]
00027       ttk::style layout    BButton [ttk::style layout TButton]
00028       
00029     }
00030     
00031     # Add the light theme colors
00032     array set themes [list light [list [ttk::style configure "." -background] [ttk::style configure "." -foreground]]]
00033     
00034     foreach name [array names themes] {
00035       
00036       # Get the primary and secondary colors for the given theme
00037       lassign $themes($name) primary secondary
00038       
00039       # Create the lighter version of the primary color
00040       lassign [winfo rgb . $primary] r g b
00041       set hsv [utils::rgb_to_hsv [expr $r >> 8] [expr $g >> 8] [expr $b >> 8]]
00042       lset hsv 2 [expr [lindex $hsv 2] + 25]
00043       set rgb [utils::hsv_to_rgb {*}$hsv]
00044       set light_primary [format {#%02x%02x%02x} {*}$rgb]
00045 
00046       # Create colors palette
00047       array set colors [list \
00048         -disabledfg "#999999" \
00049         -frame      $primary \
00050         -lightframe $light_primary \
00051         -window     $primary \
00052         -dark       "#cfcdc8" \
00053         -darker     "#bab5ab" \
00054         -darkest    "#9e9a91" \
00055         -lighter    $secondary \
00056         -lightest   $secondary \
00057         -selectbg   "#4a6984" \
00058         -selectfg   "#ffffff" \
00059       ]
00060       
00061       ttk::style theme create $name -parent clam
00062       
00063       ttk::style theme settings $name {
00064         
00065         ttk::style configure "." \
00066           -background        $colors(-frame) \
00067           -foreground        $colors(-lighter) \
00068           -bordercolor       $colors(-darkest) \
00069           -darkcolor         $colors(-dark) \
00070           -troughcolor       $colors(-darker) \
00071           -arrowcolor        $colors(-lighter) \
00072           -selectbackground  $colors(-selectbg) \
00073           -selectforeground  $colors(-selectfg) \
00074           -selectborderwidth 0 \
00075           -font              TkDefaultFont
00076 
00077         ttk::style map "." \
00078           -background       [list disabled $colors(-frame) \
00079                                   active   $colors(-lighter)] \
00080           -foreground       [list disabled $colors(-disabledfg)] \
00081           -selectbackground [list !focus   $colors(-darkest)] \
00082           -selectforeground [list !focus   white]
00083     
00084         ttk::style configure TButton \
00085           -anchor center -width -11 -padding 5 -relief raised -background $colors(-lighter) -foreground $colors(-frame)
00086         ttk::style map TButton \
00087           -background  [list disabled  $colors(-lighter) \
00088                              pressed   $colors(-darker) \
00089                              active    $colors(-lightframe)] \
00090           -lightcolor  [list pressed   $colors(-darker)] \
00091           -darkcolor   [list pressed   $colors(-darker)] \
00092           -bordercolor [list alternate "#000000"]
00093           
00094 #        ttk::style configure DButton \
00095 #          -anchor center -width -11 -padding 5 -relief sunken -background $colors(-darker) -foreground $colors(-frame)
00096 #        ttk::style map DButton \
00097 #          -background  [list disabled  $colors(-lighter) \
00098 #                             pressed   $colors(-darker) \
00099 #                             active    $colors(-darker)] \
00100 #          -lightcolor  [list pressed   $colors(-darker)] \
00101 #          -darkcolor   [list pressed   $colors(-darker)] \
00102 #          -bordercolor [list alternate "#000000"]
00103 
00104 #        ttk::style configure FButton \
00105 #          -anchor center -padding 2 -relief flat -background $colors(-lightframe) -foreground $colors(-frame)
00106 #        ttk::style map FButton \
00107 #          -background  [list disabled  $colors(-lighter) \
00108 #                             pressed   $colors(-darker) \
00109 #                             active    $colors(-dark)] \
00110 #          -lightcolor  [list pressed   $colors(-darker)] \
00111 #          -darkcolor   [list pressed   $colors(-darker)] \
00112 #          -bordercolor [list alternate "#000000"]
00113     
00114         ttk::style configure BButton \
00115           -anchor center -padding 2 -relief flat -background $colors(-frame) -foreground $colors(-frame)
00116         ttk::style map BButton \
00117           -background  [list disabled  $colors(-frame) \
00118                              pressed   $colors(-darker) \
00119                              active    $colors(-lightframe)] \
00120           -lightcolor  [list pressed   $colors(-darker)] \
00121           -darkcolor   [list pressed   $colors(-darker)] \
00122           -bordercolor [list alternate "#000000"]
00123 
00124 #        ttk::style configure LButton \
00125 #          -anchor center -padding 4 -relief flat -background $colors(-frame) -foreground $colors(-frame)
00126 #        ttk::style map LButton \
00127 #          -background  [list disabled  $colors(-frame) \
00128 #                             pressed   $colors(-darker) \
00129 #                             active    $colors(-dark)] \
00130 #          -lightcolor  [list pressed   $colors(-darker)] \
00131 #          -darkcolor   [list pressed   $colors(-darker)] \
00132 #          -bordercolor [list alternate "#000000"]
00133 
00134 #        ttk::style configure Toolbutton \
00135 #          -anchor center -padding 2 -relief flat
00136 #        ttk::style map Toolbutton \
00137 #          -relief     [list disabled flat \
00138 #                            selected sunken \
00139 #                            pressed  sunken \
00140 #                            active   raised] \
00141 #          -background [list disabled $colors(-frame) \
00142 #                            pressed  $colors(-darker) \
00143 #                            active   $colors(-lighter)] \
00144 #          -lightcolor [list pressed  $colors(-darker)] \
00145 #          -darkcolor  [list pressed  $colors(-darker)]
00146         
00147         ttk::style configure TMenubutton \
00148           -width 0 -padding 0 -relief flat -background $colors(-frame) -foreground $colors(-lighter)
00149         ttk::style map TMenubutton \
00150           -background  [list disabled  $colors(-frame) \
00151                              pressed   $colors(-lightframe) \
00152                              active    $colors(-lightframe)] \
00153           -lightcolor  [list pressed   $colors(-darker)] \
00154           -darkcolor   [list pressed   $colors(-darker)] \
00155           -bordercolor [list alternate "#000000"]
00156 
00157         # ttk::style configure TEntry -padding 1 -insertwidth 1 -fieldbackground $colors(-lighter) -foreground black
00158         ttk::style configure TEntry -padding 1 -insertwidth 1 -foreground black
00159         ttk::style map TEntry \
00160           -background  [list readonly $colors(-frame)] \
00161           -foreground  [list readonly $colors(-lighter)] \
00162           -bordercolor [list focus    $colors(-selectbg)] \
00163           -lightcolor  [list focus    "#6f9dc6"] \
00164           -darkcolor   [list focus    "#6f9dc6"]
00165             
00166         ttk::style map TScrollbar \
00167           -background  [list disabled $colors(-frame) \
00168                              active   $colors(-lightframe)]
00169           
00170         ttk::style configure TLabelframe \
00171           -labeloutside true -labelmargins {0 0 0 4} \
00172           -borderwidth 2 -relief raised
00173     
00174         ttk::style configure Sash -sashthickness 5 -gripcount 10
00175         
00176       }
00177       
00178     }
00179     
00180     # Watch for any changes to the General/WindowTheme preference value
00181     trace variable preferences::prefs(General/WindowTheme) w "themes::handle_theme_change"
00182   
00183   }
00184   
00185   ######################################################################
00186   # Handles any changes to the General/WindowTheme preference variable.
00187   proc handle_theme_change {{name1 ""} {name2 ""} {op ""}} {
00188     
00189     variable themes
00190     
00191     set theme $preferences::prefs(General/WindowTheme)
00192     
00193     if {[info exists themes($theme)]} {
00194       ttk::style theme use         $theme
00195       menus::handle_window_theme   $theme
00196       gui::handle_window_theme     $theme
00197       sidebar::handle_window_theme $theme
00198     }
00199     
00200   }
00201   
00202 }
